fields.name: isEngagingNetwork
fields.label: Select this checkbox if you would like to use datatable for Engaging Network

fields.name: engagingnetworkURL
fields.label: Engaging Network URL
fields.description: Enter the URL for the Engaging Network.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Enter the title of your table.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Sub Title
fields.description: Enter an optional subtitle.

fields.name: col_headers
fields.label: Column Headers
fields.description: Enter a comma-delimited list of column headers to be included in the table, in the order you want them displayed (e.g. Rank, Make, Model, AALA, US_HQ, TDC)

fields.name: tableId
fields.label: Table Id
fields.description: You must add a specific non-duplicate ID to the table tag. In this field put that ID.

fields.name: summary
fields.label: Summary
fields.description: Provide a short summary of the table.

fields.name: freezeTopRow
fields.label: Freeze Top Row and Show X Rows Before Scroll
fields.description: Freeze the top (header) row and show x rows of data before scrolling. This number should be one of the options in the Available Page Counts list. Must be smaller or equal to the current pageCounts to have an effect.

fields.name: availablePageCounts
fields.label: Available Page Counts
fields.description: Enter a comma separated list of 2 or more numbers to populate the Items per Page dropdown list.

fields.name: initialPageCount
fields.label: Initial Page Count
fields.description: This number must appear among the list in Available Page Counts.

validation.customErrorMsg: Please provide the value between 10 and 50.

fields.name: social-links_blogName
fields.label: Blog Name
fields.description: Enter the blog name if you have added a WordPress URL above.

validation.customErrorMsg: Fact focal text should not exceed 7-8 characters.
Fact focal text should not exceed 7-8 characters.

videoId
fields.label: Video ID
fields.description: Video ID. Example: If the video URL is 'youtube.com/watch?v=sampleID', the ID would be 'sampleID'.

fields.name: playlistId
fields.label: Playlist ID
fields.description: Youtube Playlist ID. Example: If the video URL is 'youtube.com/watch?v=ignore&list=sampleID', the ID would be 'sampleID'.

fields.label: Check to Hide the Policy Details.
